main.headline: Zedjs
main.ingress: The micro frontend JavaScript framework for building user interfaces

cols.title: Micro means Micro
cols.desc: Less than 1kb framework overhead, components only used when needed

cols.title: Write less code
cols.desc: Build components using languages you already know â€” HTML, CSS and JavaScript

cols.title: Component-Based
cols.desc: Build encapsulated components that manage their own state, then compose them to make complex UIs.

cols.title: Content management
cols.desc: Use JSON to manage the content of components and component usage itself
